SnakesnLadders

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnakesnLadders.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements methods for initializing players and utility methods like connecting to the server, sending and receiving message to and from the server, getter and setters.

      void setPosition(int pos)
      Sets player position based on the snakes & ladders squares If the player lands in one of the ladder or snake squares, the switch function makes sure that the final position is altered accordingly.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int pos)
        Sets player position based on the snakes & ladders squares If the player lands in one of the ladder or snake squares, the switch function makes sure that the final position is altered accordingly.
        Parameters:
        pos - the square where the player is to be put
